connection_error.title: 이런, 0L 네트워크에 접속할 수 없습니다
connection_error.body:
사용하고 있는 업스트림 피어 (서버)가 동작하지 않는 것으로 보입니다.

걱정하지 마세요, 지갑과 코인들은 안전합니다.

만약 피어 업데이트나 새로고침이 필요하면 다음과 같이 할 수 있습니다:

recovery_mode.title: 복구 모드
recovery_mode.body: 네트워크가 동작합니다! 하지만 복구 모드로 실행중이므로, 아직 증명에 대한 보상이 지급되지 않습니다. 복구 모드가 종료되는 것을 기다려 주십시오. 종료 후, 증명에 대한 보상이 있습니다. 이폭 {epoch_recovery_ends}이 이폭 {epoch_recovery_ends_after}으로 바뀔 때, 복구 모드는 종료됩니다.

wallet.newbie_message: 계정을 가지고 있지 않은 것 같군요

reminder_create.message_headline: 계정 생성을 위한 키를 생성하였지만, 아직 온체인 상에서는 존재하지 않습니다.

account_list.message: 마이닝을 포함해 거래를 생성할 때마다 잔고가 조금씩 줄어듭니다.

keygen.title: 새 계정 생성
keygen.description: 계정 및 시드키 생성 후, 계정이 온체인에 생성되기 위해서는 누군가가 1 0L 코인을 계정으로 보내주어야 합니다.
keygen.onboard_key_description: 인증 키로도 알려져 있습니다. 지금은 계정을 온체인에 등록할 때 필요합니다.
keygen.securite_note: 이것이 당신의 비밀 계정 구문(니모닉)입니다. 잃어버릴 시 누구도 도와줄 수 없습니다! 꼭 적어두시길 권합니다.
keygen.account_tips: 아직 계정이 온체인에 존재하지 않습니다. 온보딩 키를 누군가에게 공유하여, 그들이 당신의 계정을 생성할 수 있도록 할 필요가 있습니다.

account_from_mnem_submit.title: Heads Up!
account_from_mnem_submit.body:
Are you sure you wrote down your mnemonic phrase?

You won't be able to recover your account without it. No one can help you if lose it.

This is the last opportunity to write it down.

account_from_mnem_from.title: RESTORE ACCOUNT
account_from_mnem_from.description: Using your recovery words (mnemonic) you can configure Carpe as a wallet to monitor, and send transactions

langapp_settings.title: Language and Appearance
langapp_settings.lang_description: Choose the language used to display

network_settings.title: NETWORK SETTINGS
network_settings.description: Choose a playlist of upstream nodes, so you can access the chain. Network connections will try the list in random order until a connection is made. Simply link to any playlist.json file here to update peers.
network_settings.override_peers_description: You can force using a different peer. You can only choose one peer with this setting. It will remove the playlist. This will now be a list of one element.
network_settings.upstream_title: FETCH A NEW WAYPOINT FROM UPSTREAM
network_settings.upstream_subtitle: Most waypoint issues can easily be fixed by fetching an updated one from a connected upstream peer.

account_settings.title: ACCOUNT SETTINGS
account_settings.comfirm: Confirm remove accounts from this device? This is not reversable.
account_settings.description: This does not delete any accounts from the chain. It only removes the accounts from this device. If you do not have your recovery codes (mnemonic) stored somewhere, you may be locked out of this account permanently. NO ONE CAN HELP YOU RECOVER THE MNEMONIC.

miner_process.notes:
The percentage is an estimate.
It is based on your previous proof's elapsed time.
miner_process.notes2: Over 100% only means this is taking longer than previous proof

tower_state.proof_more: You have submitted max proofs today (max 72)
tower_state.proof_less: Insufficient proofs to receive a reward today (min 8)
tower_state.proof_ok: Your account has submitted enough proofs today (min 8)

cant_start.title: Your account does not exist on chain yet
cant_start.body: The miner can't start until the account can be found on chain. Maybe you've generated new keys locally, but no one has sent any coins to that address?

disco_error.title: Discontinuity
disco_error.body: Looks like there's a gap in the proofs you are submitting. Each proof needs to reference the previous one, and the proof was rejected because of this.

epoch_status.empty_body: There are no proofs saved to the chain. When you successfully submit your first proof, you will see some stats here.
epoch_status.in_process_body: Your account needs to submit at least 8 proofs per day (epoch) to receive a reward. You will receive the reward on the next day.
epoch_status.complete_body: Your account has submitted enough proofs today (minimum 8 proofs per epoch). You should receive rewards at the start of next epoch.
epoch_status.exceed_body: You have mined 72 proofs, the maximum number of proofs per epoch. The tower can keep making proofs but they will only be accepted in the next epoch.

first_proof.title: Let's mine your first proof
first_proof.body:
Hang tight! This will take at least 30mins, maybe up to 1hr

You will see your balance go down while you mine proofs. If you reach the minimum per day, you will receive a reward, on the next day (epoch).

Check your computer settings so that the computer doesn't sleep when the screen shuts off. You want the miner running while you're not here.
first_proof.body_disabled: Turn the switch on to start mining!

invalid_proof.title: Cannot Verify Proof
invalid_proof.body: Weird. This proof was rejected because it is not a valid "delay proof". This is usually because parameters are not set correctly.

oops.title: Oops
oops.body: Looks like there's an error with mining a delay proof

too_many_proofs.title: Too Many Proofs
too_many_proofs.body: Looks like you've sent more proofs than expected during the last 24 hours. The chain expects a max {maxNum} proofs during each epoch. On the next epoch your proofs will begin to be submitted again.

wrong_difficulty.title: Wrong Difficulty
wrong_difficulty.body: Looks like you're sending a proof with the wrong difficulty parameters to the chain. Check you are connected to the right network with the correct difficulty settings.

sync_proof.title: Syncing your proofs
sync_proof.body_0: Something is wrong, you have more proofs on-chain, than on this device. You may be missing proofs locally.

onboard.title: Onboard an Account
onboard.no_balance_body2: Looks like you have less than 2 coins in your account, this means you won't be able to onboard anyone.

set_wallet_type.title: Set your Account Type
set_wallet_type.subtitle: Make sure you know what you are doing. This is not reversible. Slow and Community wallets are permanent.
set_wallet_type.btn_confirm_slow: Confirm Set Slow Wallet? This is not reversable.
set_wallet_type.community_confirm: Confirm Set Community Wallet? This is not reversable.

transfer.title: Coin Transfer
transfer.error_amount_greater_than_balance: Amount cannot be greater than account balance
transfer.error_receiver_equals_sender: Receiver address must be different from sender address
transfer.error_slow_wallet: Coin transfer is disabled for slow wallets.

loading.corrupted_db: The server you are connected to does not have all your event history available.
loading.account_off_chain: Account selected not onboarded yet, and has no events.

card.title: Claim Your Missing Coins
card.body:
Oops. Occasionally blockchains make math mistakes. 0L tries to fix them as quickly as possible.

Miner Identity Subsidy Incident: From Epoch 0 to epoch 52, the payouts to miners was lower than expected. Below you can credit your missing coins from that period.

modal_success.title: Transaction confirmed!
modal_success.amount_for_account:
You have claimed {coins} coins for account
{account}.
modal_success.check_balance: You can check your balance now.

modal_error.title: Claim Error
modal_error.body: You must turn off miner to claim this account coins.
